metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20378 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: ganglia-web (aka Ganglia Web Frontend) through 3.7.5 allows XSS via the header.php ce parameter.

notes.Note: sbeattie> See README.Debian.security, only supported behind an authenticated HTTP zone

criterions.comment: ganglia-web: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
